name: Digital Housekeeping Checklist ⇢ Notion Template
description: In today’s fast-paced digital world, staying organized and maintaining security can feel overwhelming. This Digital Housekeeping Checklist template is designed to help you declutter and safeguard your digital life with ease. From organizing files and cleaning up your inbox to protecting your data with strong passwords and two-factor authentication, this checklist guides you step-by-step through the essential tasks needed to stay on top of your digital world.
